Name: Stand By Me
About the game: A colorful physics game about caring for your friends. In Stand By Me, play as the curious and adventurous Pico as he travels through a fantastic and ever-changing geometric land with the aid of its many magnetic denizens â€“ and help him find at long last what he's searching for. Over 100 unique stages across seven books ; Over a dozen different magnets and stage elements to interact with; A dynamic picture-book-themed story ; All original groovy soundtrack (and sound effects); An in-game timer for tracking your run times; Five unlockable player skills that greatly change gameplay; Make-a-Friend : customize your own friends! Assorted hats.
